root: ^That is incredible! As expected, no foe is any match to a Pilgrim. Even with the world in disarray, the Prophecies still hold true.
^Without their leader, the Beasts should now become more scattered, and we can once again find safe routes to gather supplies.
^Though, I must ask... have you found any other Church members on your journey there?

c-0: ^Still, I will not give up hope. I will continue to pray.
^Nonetheless, I believe you deserve a generous reward for your deeds. Here you go.
^You have earned my gratitude. May God bless you.
